reviews.review: Not only is it addicting but it also knows how to make you hate yourself just enough to be even more addicting.
got yelled and flashed at the same time by Russians,but still had fun with Negev
Good game. Point crosshair on man. Shoot bullet, bullet miss. die. I love
pro tip: if the enemy has skins you can probably catch them off guard while they are inspecting their knife on the rotate.
Its hard to get into, there's a curve learning the pattern of shooting a gun.
对于新手不太友好，对于老玩家也有机会被杀，每一次新的开局多是一次全新的体验，段位匹配机制让你也有发挥空间，只是官匹瓜多，在每一次赢下残局的时候肾上腺素飙升，不得不承认你热爱这款游戏。ps：别捡地上的枪
FCK TRD GAME, TOO MUCH CHEATING. ITS NOT WORTH IT.
虽然刚开始玩，但是真的很好玩

外挂没有母亲，这是很难过的一件事情，但是他的父亲是谁，我们一无所知，毕竟每个人都有可能是他的父亲。
外掛沒有母親，這是很難過的一件事情，但是他的父親是誰，我們一無所知，畢竟每個人都有可能是他的父親。
プラグインのない母親がいるのは悲しいことですが、父親が誰なのかわかりません。
It is a sad thing to have a mother without a plug-in, but we do n’t know who his father is. After all, everyone can be his father.
C'est triste d'avoir une mère sans plug-in, mais on ne sait pas qui est son père, après tout, tout le monde peut être son père.
Грустно иметь мать без плагина, но мы не знаем, кто его отец. Ведь каждый может быть его отцом.
Es ist traurig, eine Mutter ohne Plug-In zu haben, aber wir wissen nicht, wer sein Vater ist. Schließlich kann jeder sein Vater sein.
plug-in မပါသောမိခင်တစ် ဦး ရှိခြင်းသည်ဝမ်းနည်းဖွယ်ကောင်းသော်လည်းသူ၏ဖခင်သည်မည်သူမည်ဝါဖြစ်ကြောင်းကျွန်ုပ်တို့မသိပါ။
Είναι λυπηρό να έχουμε μια μητέρα χωρίς προσθήκη, αλλά δεν ξέρουμε ποιος είναι ο πατέρας του. Εξάλλου, όλοι μπορούν να είναι ο πατέρας του.

Oyunun yıllarca oynanıyor  olması   kaliteli ve stabile bir fps  game olduğunu zaten yıllarca kanıtlamış durumda ancak oyunda  o kadar çok hileli  ve küçük yaştaki çocuklar varki anlatamam.Hile yüzünden quit attığım  çok olmuştur ayrıca  reportların  artık hiç bir işe yaramadığıda kesin.Sağlam  bir  güncelleme  ile tekrar oynanabilecek bir oyun  olması dışında   gelen  paketlerin yüksek fiyat olmasıda oyunun eksilerinden sayabilirz.
jogo otimo pena que ainda contem hacks

As a successor to the popular Counter Strike 1.6, this game has gained mainstream popularity with its updated graphics, maps, player skins, tactics etc. Its been a wild ride, but a great one!
